body_html: @vrv i came to this point after spending quite time on these issues and buying a new PSU so it costed me a lot. To avoid further waste of time, i want to ask a question: there are at least 15 deep learning library that i heard. Cuda and cuDNN was necessary for tensorflow. Is this situation (compute capability) special for cuda library? May i have any other chances? if not, i will give up right know and go on to work with CPU (Forgive my ignorence)
